title: Cloudwatch Alarm to SNS with Kinesis Firehose Fanout to Opensearch

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The purpose of this pattern is to deploy the infrastructure necessary to use Kinesis Data Firehose to fanout Cloudwatch Alarms using SNS to OpenSearch for analytics purposes.
